nodes.text: A fleet of the Confederacy of Independent Systems' naval forces was active during the Clone Wars against the Galactic Republic. The fleet was stationed above the Confederacy capital world of Raxus Secundus and consisted of a Providence-class Dreadnought, a Lucrehulk-class Battleship, a Recusant-class light destroyer, and at least four Munificent-class star frigates. In 21 BBY, Republic Senator Padmé Amidala, accompanied by Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano, traveled to Raxus to meet with her friend-now-Separatist Senator Mina Bonteri, where they came across several vessels of the planetary defense fleet.

The Raxus Secundus defense fleet appeared, albeit unnamed, in "Heroes on Both Sides," the tenth episode of the animated television series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' third season, which aired on November 19, 2010.
